description: Made from indigo-dyed cotton woven in Japan. Discharge-printed with a Southwestern-inspired motif that is over-printed with terracotta-hued highlights. Authentic runoff chain-stitched construction at the side seams, which is based on workshirts from '20s and '30s. Muslin reinforcements at the interior. Genuine mother-of-pearl buttons. Washed for a sun-faded look and a broken-in feel.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 30.5" back body length, an 18.25" shoulder, a 43.5" chest, and a 34.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Point collar. Buttoned placket. Genuine mother-of-pearl buttons.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Authentic runoff chain-stitched construction at the side seams.
Dyed with true indigo, which may rub off onto fabrics, leather, and upholstery.
